mapper.insert: insert into tbl_study(study_num, member_num, study_title, study_intro, study_area, study_people, study_regist_date, study_ing, study_depart, study_contact) values(#{studyNum}, #{memberNum}, #{studyTitle}, #{studyIntro}, #{studyArea}, #{studyPeople}, #{studyRegistDate}, #{studyIng}, #{studyDepart}, #{studyContact})
mapper.select: select study_regist_date from tbl_study order by study_regist_date desc
